Always keep a backup of the file.
words.defineEn: to have or store something in a specific place
words.defineVi: để có hoặc lưu trữ một cái gì đó ở một nơi cụ thể

examples: The delicate aroma of ripe may apples fills the kitchen.
A voice came from the kitchen.
The aromatic spice fills the kitchen with a delightful scent.
The kitchen was filled with the smell of garlic.
I love the aroma of fresh herbs in my kitchen.
words.defineEn: the place in a building or home where we make food
words.defineVi: nơi trong một tòa nhà hoặc nhà nơi chúng tôi làm thức ăn

examples: The fridge has a freezer section for storing frozen foods.
Milk and cream should keep quite well in a fridge.
The fridge door has a magnetic strip to hold notes and pictures.
I opened the fridge to get a bottle of water.
I put leftovers in the fridge to save them for later.
words.defineEn: a container, usually put in a kitchen, that uses electricity to keep food cool and fresh
words.defineVi: một thùng chứa, thường được đặt trong nhà bếp, sử dụng điện để giữ cho thực phẩm tươi và mát

examples: He stored the leftover chard in the refrigerator to use in future meals.
Now, I'm not pointing the finger at anyone in particular, but someone here has been stealing food from the communal refrigerator.
Early in the twentieth century, home refrigerators became available.
- Poor families in America have, 99% of them have a refrigerator.
They have bathrooms, sinks, refrigerators, complex lighting systems and unique construction.
words.defineEn: an electrical equipment used to keep food and drinks cool and fresh
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện được sử dụng để giữ cho thực phẩm và đồ uống mát và tươi

examples: This dictionary goes on the top shelf.
To hit the shops/stores/shelves.
The book on the shelf had a purple cover.
He kept his favorite toys on the shelves in his bedroom.
I can't reach the top shelf.
words.defineEn: a flat, narrow board made of wood, metal, etc. attached to a wall, to put items on
words.defineVi: một tấm ván phẳng, hẹp làm bằng gỗ, kim loại, v.v. gắn vào tường, để đặt các vật dụng lên
